pages.text: Taken of the Attack can attack targets with taken magic damage, more effective against bewitched entities.$(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Force can increase gains)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()$(t:Raising the Duration can increase gains)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration$(/t)$()
